paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene, including a novel frameshift mutation and other rare variants, along with penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We have identified one novel frameshift mutation affecting BRCA2 caused by an -/AC insertion affecting one patient only.

functional_data.summary: The frameshift mutation is expected to lead to a truncated and presumably dysfunctional protein.

variants.segregation_data: Segregated with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first report on the breast cancer predisposition factors in the population of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
key_quotes: We have identified a novel insertion that led to a frameshift mutation (p.Thr363fs) in BRCA2 causing the synthesis of a truncated and presumably dysfunctional protein.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We have identified another rare mutation in BRCA2 in one of our patients. Represented by the rs80358972 SNP, the p.Arg2494Stop affecting BRCA2 has been reported by the Breast Cancer Information Core.

functional_data.summary: The nonsense mutation is expected to result in a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: Segregated with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant has been reported by the Breast Cancer Information Core submitted by Myriad Genetics.
key_quotes: We have identified another rare mutation in BRCA2 in one of our patients. Represented by the rs80358972 SNP, the p.Arg2494Stop affecting BRCA2 has been reported by the Breast Cancer Information Core.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We observed an increase in the number of breast cancer cases displaying the homozygous GG minor allele state that is not seen in the control cases.

functional_data.summary: The clinical significance of this variant remains uncertain.

variants.additional_notes: The minor allele frequency of the rs1799950 SNP did not differ significantly from controls.
key_quotes: We observed an increase in the number of breast cancer cases displaying the homozygous GG minor allele state that is not seen in the control cases.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted with detailed penetrance data.
